workExperience.job: Sr. Mobile Software Engineer and Team Lead
details: Leaded and guided the mobile team through the mobile applications development process.
Created and monitored templates and reusable components for the team to ease and decrease the time of the mobile applications development process.
Helped the business and design teams to provide specific features of the mobile applications.
Distributed applications to both GooglePlay and AppStore as well as managing the developers accounts.
Developed ReactNative, native Android and native iOS mobile applications using JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, Kotlin and Swift.
